ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Okay...new term (to me) de-levelling?
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope, however, it s kinda lame to do it. Tho, so many say that they are facing someone that de-leveled and yet i know about 3 players that have REALY done this
ygData.messageBody:
Nope, however, it's kinda lame to do it. Tho, so many say that they are
facing someone that de-leveled and yet i know about 3 players that have
REALY done this on Tallon Zek. This is not very common and i would bet that
you rather meet someone that were better to twink his char than most =P



> -----Original Message-----
> From: stonemn@... [SMTP:stonemn@...]
> Sent: Monday, April 23, 2001 7:22 PM
> To: everquest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EverQuest] Okay...new term (to me) de-levelling?
>
> I was wandering around Oasis w/ my 13 bard and my groupmate (higher than
> me) hot jumped by someone approximately his level (around 14-15), and he
> said his attacker was "de-leveled" because of the amount of damage he did.
> Do you not lose your skill levels when you lose a level?
>
>
